alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County; South Central Utah; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Washington County through 415 PM MDT... At 330 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of La Verkin, or 11 miles west of Zion National Park, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zion National Park, Hurricane, La Verkin, Apple Valley, Toquerville, Virgin, Springdale and Rockville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
